Event.EventTitle: The Heart Truth ''I Heart Shoes'' Auction
Event.EventDescription: Heart disease and stroke is a leading killer of women in Canada. Take a step towards eliminating cardiovascular disease — attend the Heart and Stroke Foundation''s ''I Heart Shoes'' Auction presented by Investors Group. Enjoy a shoe fashion show, refreshments and the choice of hundreds of shoes up for auction on Thursday, April 4 at the Delta Winnipeg. Doors open at 5:30 p.m. Tickets are $50 and can be purchased online at LiveRed.mb.ca/HeartTruth or by calling 204-949-2019.
